LoginPage.title: Sign in to your account
LoginPage.subtitle: Don't have an account?
LoginPage.loginSuccessDescription: You have successfully logged in to your account.
LoginPage.verificationRequiredDescription: Please verify your email address to activate your account.

RegistrationPage.title: Create your account
RegistrationPage.subtitle: Already have an account?
RegistrationPage.registerSuccessDescription: Please click the link sent to your email to verify your email address.
RegistrationPage.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
RegistrationPage.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
RegistrationPage.passwordNoLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
RegistrationPage.passwordNoNumber: Password must contain at least one number

VerificationPage.title: Email Verification
VerificationPage.subtitle: Enter the 4-digit verification code sent to
VerificationPage.successSubtitle: Your account has been successfully verified. You can now sign in.
VerificationPage.successDescription: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
VerificationPage.verificationSuccessDescription: Your account has been successfully verified. You can now sign in.
VerificationPage.resendSuccessDescription: A new verification code has been sent to your email address.

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPasswordPage.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link.
ForgotPasswordPage.successSubtitle: Password reset link has been sent to
ForgotPasswordPage.successDescription: Don't forget to check your spam folder. You can create a new password using the 4-digit code in your email.
ForgotPasswordPage.invalidEmailDescription: Please enter a valid email address.
ForgotPasswordPage.emailSentDescription: Password reset link has been sent to your email address.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Create New Password
ResetPasswordPage.subtitle: Enter the verification code sent to and create a new password.
ResetPasswordPage.verificationCodeHelp: Enter the 4-digit code sent to your email address.
ResetPasswordPage.successSubtitle: You can now sign in with your new password.
ResetPasswordPage.successDescription: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now sign in with your new password.
ResetPasswordPage.fillAllFieldsDescription: Please enter the verification code, new password and password confirmation.
ResetPasswordPage.passwordMismatchDescription: Please enter the same password twice.
ResetPasswordPage.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
ResetPasswordPage.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
ResetPasswordPage.passwordNoLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
ResetPasswordPage.passwordNoNumber: Password must contain at least one number
ResetPasswordPage.invalidLinkDescription: Email address not found. Please start over from the forgot password page.
ResetPasswordPage.resetSuccessDescription: You can now sign in with your new password.

Footer.description: Vote on sports, movies, music, technology and many other topics. Share your ideas and determine the best with the community.

SearchPage.title: Search Tests
SearchPage.noResultsForSearch: No results found for "{searchTerm}". Try different keywords.
SearchPage.noResultsInCategory: No tests found in this category yet.

welcome.title: Welcome!

systemMaintenance.title: System Maintenance
systemMaintenance.message: System maintenance completed. New features have been added!

ProfilePage.changePasswordDesc: Click the button below to change your password
ProfilePage.noVotedTestsDesc: When you start voting on tests, your voted tests will appear here.

ProfilePage.deleteConfirmDesc: Your account and all your data will be permanently deleted.

AuthMessages.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
AuthMessages.unauthorized: You don't have permission for this operation.
AuthMessages.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
AuthMessages.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection.
AuthMessages.emailAlreadyExists: This email address is already registered.
AuthMessages.userCreated: User created successfully. Please verify your email address.
AuthMessages.accountInactive: Your account is inactive. Please contact the administrator.

AuthMessages.passwordTokenExpired: Your code has expired. Please try again.
AuthMessages.systemError: System error occurred. Please try again.
AuthMessages.accountDeleteSuccess: Your account has been successfully deleted.

AuthMessages.invalidStatus: Invalid status. Only 'active' or 'inactive' statuses are accepted
